H0.text: who issued ashwamedha coins after performing ashvamedha sacrifice. Chandragupta II

H1.text: who issued ashwamedha coins after performing ashvamedha sacrifice. Kumaragupta I

H2.text: who issued ashwamedha coins after performing ashvamedha sacrifice. Skandagupta

H3.text: who issued ashwamedha coins after performing ashvamedha sacrifice. Samudragupta

A4.text: Samudragupta performed the Ashvamedha ritual and issued gold coins to mark this performance.

A5.text: The Mathura stone inscription of Chandragupta II describes Samudragupta as 'the restorer of the Ashvamedha sacrifice that had been long in abeyance'.

A6.text: Samudragupta performed the Ashvamedha horse sacrifice to proclaim his military prowess.
